Class PooledParticleEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.ParticleEffect

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Updatable

    public class PooledParticleEffect
extends ParticleEffect
    An instance of ParticleEffect that can be returned to a ParticleEffectPool for re-use.
